On Monday 18 September 2006 04:29, isowitz wrote:
> I have a short question. Is it good to make a assertTrue(),
> assertEquals () etc. in the setUp() or tearDown() methode?

As long as your whole test isn't inside the setup code but still in the 
test methods, I don't see a problem with that.
Especially, if you are in a less than ideal world and have to use setup 
code on which you don't want to rely.

Robert
